version_description:
Daily rewards! The Island can provide unexpected surprises washed up on shore, for each new (real) day!
Optimisation for character AI
Bug fixes.

Daily rewards! The Island can provide unexpected surprises washed up on shore, for each new (real) day!
Optimisation for character AI
Bug fixes.

Offline timers - We have had lots of great feedback about the in-game clock stopping while the app is in the background. So now the game will continue to run for 10 minutes offline. This means your Islanders can finish any smaller tasks they were working on, or progress longer tasks, but just enough to ensure they don’t run out of daylight to complete the all important Daily Challenges! Win-win!

Work Harder! - You can now make your Islanders Work Harder on their tasks to speed things up, but, watch out! If you work them too hard, they’ll take a morale hit – and may leave The Island … forever!

New Starter Packs! - There are several new in-app offers to help you kick-start your Island experience or find that vital resource.

FAQ! - We have added an FAQ for all the best tips on how to play the game if you get stuck.

New Season prize buildings! (you’ll have to complete The Island to see what they are!)
